name: Goats & Gongs
description:
Cheers!

This is a 2 players local-coop protect the goat from the fire game! You will need 2 local players to play it (If you have no friends at all ask your pets) and 2 controllers.

My team and I did this project in about 4 months to test out a new game idea! And we would greatly appreciate any feedback! Angry, happy, diabolical feedback. Anything really... (Comments section below)

You are 2 young monks and the temple's trial is all about goat protecting. Take her (Bertha) through the 14 rooms safely and you shall elevate yourself as worthy disciples!

Hope you enjoy at least a little, thanks for playing!


REQUIRED: 2 local players & 2 controllers
*Can't play on mouse & keyboard

CONTROLS:
Left Joystick = Move your character around
Right Joystick = rotate shield towards the dragons to block the fire.

Use Alt+Enter to go full-screen or windowed
Use Alt+F4 to Quit the Game
